title: Mind Reading - Novel Updates
tags: Childhood Friends   Disabilities   Female Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Leisurely Lass   清闲丫头
description:
Many years later, Shen Yi told Su Tang that his eyes lit up when he saw her for the first time. She was wearing a warm yellow dress and her face and her cheeks were blushing as if she walked out of a Japanese anime. 
 
Su Tang asked, “Which anime?” 

Shen Yi’s eyes smiled and used sign language to spell out the name of the anime: “Pokemon”. 

Su Tang: “......Divorce!” 

Shen Yi quickly added: You were full of energy. 

Su Tang: “......I'll take that back.” 

This is the story of a big hearted female lead and a deaf and mute male lead. 
>
